data.question: What is the critical temperature for the paraelectric−ferroelectric transition in [NH4][Zn(HCOO)3]?
What method was used to prepare [NH4][Zn(HCOO)3]?

What triggers the paraelectric−ferroelectric phase transition in [NH4][Zn(HCOO)3]?
What is the space group of [NH4][Zn(HCOO)3] at 110 K?
Does the unit cell triple in size during the phase transition of [NH4][Zn(HCOO)3]?
What is the role of hydrogen bonding in the electric ordering of [NH4][Zn(HCOO)3]?
Are MOFs considered promising candidates for ferroelectrics?
What is the crystal system of [NH4][Zn(HCOO)3] at 290 K?
What is the dielectric anomaly peak temperature range for [NH4][Zn(HCOO)3]?
Does the spontaneous polarization increase on cooling below the critical temperature in [NH4][Zn(HCOO)3]?
What is the Curie constant for [NH4][Zn(HCOO)3]?
Is the ferroelectric transition in [NH4][Zn(HCOO)3] characterized by a dielectric hysteresis loop?

Does the ferroelectric transition in [NH4][Zn(HCOO)3] involve a change in space group?
What is the estimated ΔH for the paraelectric−ferroelectric transition in [NH4][Zn(HCOO)3]?
Is the disorder−order transition of NH4+ cations in [NH4][Zn(HCOO)3] related to the observed ferroelectricity?
What is the significance of the disorder−order transition of NH4+ cations in the context of ferroelectricity?
data.answer: It triggers the paraelectric−ferroelectric phase transition
